alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 2:49PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Las Animas and southeastern Pueblo Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 249 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles northwest of Tyrone, or 32 miles north of Trinidad, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Las Animas and southeastern Pueblo Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
